info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 9:18AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi TX
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas...
Guadalupe River At Victoria affecting Victoria County.
For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria, Bloomington...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Guadalupe River at Victoria.
* WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs. Water begins to flow over River Road. Fox''s Bend in Riverside Park is inaccessible, and the Riverside Boat Ramp parking area is affected by flood waters.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this afternoon to 23.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening to 16.8 feet and begin rising again Saturday afternoon. It will rise to 18.2 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
